page.title: 06GLEBE FARM CANWICK
page.content: GLEBE FARM IS SITUATED IN CANWICK . THE FARM MANGER IS {MR HEMMINGTON}. {MR HEMMINGTON}DOES NOT WORK THERE ALL OF THE TIME .HIS CROPS CONSIST OF WINTER WHEAT,PEAS FOR FREEZING,SPRING BARLEY AND SUGAR BEET.THE TONNAGE PER YEAR IS,PEAS 2 TONNES PER ACRE, WHEAT IS 3 TONNES PER ACRE,SPRING BARLEY IS 2 AND A QUARTER AND SUGAR BEET 15 TONNES PER ACRE.{MR HEMMINGTON}TOLD US A HECTAR IS 2\ ACRES.CATHEDRAL CLOSE FIELD CONSISTS OF WINTER WHEAT ,PUMP FIELD CONSISTS OF PEAS FOR FREEZING. SHEEPWASH FIELD CONSISTS OF PEAS AGAIN.FARMHOUSE FIELD IS WHEAT,HIGH FIELD IS WHEAT.SYKES FIELD IS PEAS. ROAD FIELD IS SPRING BARLEY.BECK FIELD IS SUGAR BEET.SPEED FIELD IS SUGAR BEET.HE HAS ONLY THREE TRACTORS AND ONE COMBINE HARVESTER.HE HAS FOUR PLOUGHS IN HIS FARMYARD.HE DOESN,T HAVE ANY FARMYARD ANIMALS.
